description: OMBRE (shade in French) is a cryptonote currency and an indirect fork of the well-known Monero currency. Inherited from Monero are strong security, privacy and untraceability features that form a solid basis for further development. Our mission is to enhance the cryptonote protocol to provide a lightweight, secure, well maintained and [b/actively developed[/b] (no-nonsense) coin.
name: Ombre
